USBD_ASYNC_T_ Struct Reference

This structure defines the asynchronous I/O descriptor type.

Data Fields

  • IMG_INT32 iUsingCallback
  • USBD_IO_CALLBACKROUTINE_T * callback_routine
  • IMG_VOID * callback_context

Field Documentation

IMG_INT32 USBD_ASYNC_T_::iUsingCallback

Set to IMG_TRUE if the application is going to use the callback method of confirming the result. Set to IMG_FALSE if the application is going to use the GetResult method.

USBD_IO_CALLBACKROUTINE_T* USBD_ASYNC_T_::callback_routine

Pointer to USBD Callback routine.

IMG_VOID* USBD_ASYNC_T_::callback_context

Pointer to private context for callback routine.
